entry.title: Interview with Jim Bolger, former Prime Minister | A Nation Divided

media:group.media:title: Interview with Jim Bolger, former Prime Minister | A Nation Divided
media:group.media:description:
Former Prime Minister Jim Bolger, a cabinet minister in the Muldoon government, reflects on the legacy and lessons of the 1981 Springbok rugby tour.
In a 1 NEWS special we look at the key elements and characters from this turbulent era in New Zealand’s history.

entry.title: 40 years since a rugby tour split New Zealand | A Nation Divided

media:group.media:title: 40 years since a rugby tour split New Zealand | A Nation Divided
media:group.media:description:
Batons, brawls and barbed wire: Today marks 40 years since the start of the 1981 Springbok rugby tour that sparked unprecedented civil unrest in New Zealand.
In a 1 NEWS special we look at the key elements and characters from this turbulent era in New Zealand’s history.
